name: MFGG Vault: Super Mario Galaxy Pinball
name_original: MFGG Vault: Super Mario Galaxy Pinball
description:
Original Description:

I bet you weren't expecting to see another game from 'ol Toodles Team on here, were ya? Well, I decided to make one last contribution to the community in the form of Super Mario Galaxy Pinball!

The game uses mostly the mouse for control. Knock the pinball around the table and collect the Stardust from ?-blocks by using the star cursor! If you can collect enough silver stars, you might even get a chance to go for a Grand Star! Can you get the high score?
